title: Bug 119225Theme is not found when selected from theme dropdown list in a report.
description: Description: Theme is not found when selected from theme dropdown list in a report.Steps to reproduce:1. Use a library in a report.2. Select a theme in the property editor.3. Error message pops up "theme is not found".4. If I add library name before the theme name like "library1.newtheme". It can work.
